== Experience ==

=== Localization ===

The "Ubuntu Czech Translators" team has currently 6 core members responsible for reviewing proposed translations, solving problems, correcting bugs and communicating with upstream. The total number of contributors is vastly greater, about 260 contributors at present. Ubuntu 8.04 packages in Launchpad are translated in about 70%. All the main packages like Ubuntu-specific applications and documentation are mostly fully translated. In documentation all the templates except server-guide have 100% translation. We collaborate with upstream a lot, for example we have helped to achieve 94% Czech translation of Gnome 2.22 (9% increase from previous release). All the main applications which user can see from the desktop and Gnome environment are almost fully translated. We have a working localization wiki, a localization forum, a localization mailing list and a localization dictionary. We contribute to a project to unify Czech localization dictionaries between various other opensource projects like Gnome, KDE, Mozilla and others.

=== Local (Community) Support ===

Local support is provided via our <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu.cz|forum]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz|wiki]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu.cz|mailing list]]</nowiki>, jabber conference (more popular than IRC) and <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.cz/podpora/dokumentace|translated official documentation]]</nowiki>.

* '''Wiki''' 
** In more than 500 pages everybody is able to find guides for (almost) everything. Some guides are translated from English <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/|community documentation]]</nowiki>, but majority is original.
** Examples of most important pages: <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/Pr%C5%AFvodce%20instalac%C3%AD|Installation Guide]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/Pr%C5%AFvodce%20po%20instalaci|Post-installation Guide]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/FAQ|FAQ]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/Instalace%20program%C5%AF|Installing Apps]]</nowiki>...
** Wiki give raised to <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka|Czech Ubuntu Unoffical User Guide]]</nowiki> - 130 pages long "book" based on wiki.

 <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=1.png|{{http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=1.png||height=250}}]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=2.png|{{http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=2.png||height=250}}]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=3.png|{{http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/U%C5%BEivatelsk%C3%A1%20p%C5%99%C3%ADru%C4%8Dka?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=3.png||height=250}}]]</nowiki>

* '''Forum'''
** ''URL:'' http://forum.ubuntu.cz/
** ''Stats:'' More than 10 000 members (300-400 new members every month), 194 545 posts in 26 178 topics.
** Our forum is one of the biggest linux-oriented forums in Czech Republic. This is the place where daily meet the largest part of the Czech community. Forum is the most important place to help beginners with Ubuntu. Forum is maintained five admins and eleven moderators (fortunately, we do not have many problems with spammers or trolls...).

==== 12. June 2008 - Computer Press: Ubuntu User Guide ====

Computer Press, one of the czech biggest publishing house, got out book about Ubuntu called "Ubuntu Příručka uživatele" (Ubuntu User Guide) - 270 pages and 2 DVD's (Install and Repositories). This book was published in conjunction with  many members of our comunity - e.g. <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/JakubLuck%C3%BD|Jakub Lucký]]</nowiki>, JendaVancura, VojtěchTrefný, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.cz/Filipec|Filip Dominec]]</nowiki> and other.
